title: Really close to Cousin Beth Font
content:
I'm doing shirts for a fund raiser and at some point they had some shirts done using this font but I really can't buy a font for these since I'm donating them. Everyone said it doesn't have to be this exact font but it would be great if it was close. Any recommendations for a "really close" font?

Thanks again!!!
author: wannab1

comments.content:
I found one called Filibuster NF - It's pretty similar IMO.

[http://fontpark.net/en/font/filibuster-nf/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140720165608/http:/fontpark.net/en/font/filibuster-nf/ "http://fontpark.net/en/font/filibuster-nf/")
